name: mission RNBW
description:
Game made for the Weekly Game Jam #208 with the theme "Rainbow".

- Enemies will spawn with different colors.

- Shoot an enemy to get a point on its respective color.

- If you get hit by an enemy you will lose a point in its respective color.

- Get 10 points in every color to win.

- If you go over 10 points your points will restart to 7.

Assets used:

Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/super-eurobeat-pack...

Sprites: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/warped-caves-103250
